name: Bali Glazed Skewered Prawns

ingredients.name: bamboo skewers
ingredients.additionalInstruction: pre-soaked in water to prevent scorching

ingredients.name: lemon or lime juice for finishing

preparation: Combine Bali Glow Dry Glaze and oil in a resealable bag, add prawns and coat well. Let marinate in fridge for at least 10 minutes and up to 24 hours, or freeze for up to 2 weeks.
Thread prawns onto bamboo or Grill Boss skewers
Preheat grill to medium, and lightly brush with oil to prevent sticking. Place prawns on grill and cook, 2â€“3 minutes. Turn once and cook another 2 minutes until prawns are just cooked through.
Place prawn skewers onto a large platter, squeeze lemon or lime over top using a 2-in-1 Citrus Press, and serve.

products.name: Grill Boss Skewers (Set of 6)
summary: Start grilling up praise-worthy meals this season with these made-to-last reusable skewers!
